hotels.title: Heritage Southern Highlands Escape 90 Minutes from Sydney with Daily Breakfast & Golf Upgrade Available
hotels.description: You won’t have to venture far from Sydney’s CBD to experience old-world charm and country tranquility in this boutique manor-style stay. A scenic 90-minute drive from Sydney, this retreat melds all the warm features of a homely country estate with elegantly refurbished interiors. Surrounded by Southern Highland flora and adjacent to a championship golf course, guests are spoiled with opportunities to embrace nature. Tee up for a round on the green, play a game of croquet or relax by the pool under the afternoon sun - take each day at your leisure. For dining, the award-winning Katers Restaurant is on hand, serving nostalgic country fare against roaring wood fireplaces, and the onsite bar and pool table make for a cosy wind-down. With recently revamped interiors and serene gardenscapes, this Southern Highlands estate is the perfect country retreat.
